name: Noor ul Wadood Khan
bio: Noor ul Wadood aka Noor Khan is a Business Savvy, adept at turning coffee into contracts and spreadsheets into smiles! He orchestrates strategic initiatives to drive transformative growth and foster innovation. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and market insights, Noor leads his team in identifying and capitalising on emerging opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and cultivating VECTOR's product portfolio to meet the evolving needs of clients. With a focus on collaboration, excellence, and forward-thinking, Noor is committed to propelling VECTOR to new heights in the dynamic tech landscape. Together, they're not just shaping the future; they're defining it.
